arts.ttl: Fisnik Asllani earns Hoffenheim point at Freiburg after early goal exchange
arts.sum: Fisnik Asllani cancelled out Lukas Kübler's early opener as Hoffenheim held regional rivals Freiburg to a 1-1 draw at the Europa-Park Stadion. Beyond his goal, he was a constant threat to the Freiburg defence, covering an impressive 10.8 kilometres and finding himself under pressure from opponents 16 times – more than any other Hoffenheim player.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Hoffenheim preview: All-Baden clash in Breisgau
arts.sum: Sepearated by only goal difference, Freiburg welcome Hoffenheim to Europa-Park Stadion on Sunday with both teams level on six points after four Bundesliga matches.
